name: The Titan Falls
description:
Destroy your opponent for a chance to take down the dreaded pink titan. Ominous nemeses of the pink titan lurk off to the side. Their passive assistance is disturbing. Your only choice is to keep rolling to defeat your opponent.

Meant to be played as a 2 player game.

Choose your attacker, and a defender from the other team, and each player rolls to see if the attack is effective, or completely defended. Once you defeat 3 of your opponents units you can take on the Titan for a chance to win.

Doubles will bring assistance from the nemesis units on the sidelines, making your roll an instant 15.

Attacks can be deflected to damage the attacker if doubles are rolled.

Submitted for Wizard Jam 5 game jam.

Based on Idle Thumbs Podcast episode 147 title: The Titan Falls
